nodes.text: Swain Import/Export Emporium was an art boutique that was located in Cjaalysce'I on the planet Socorro. Owned by Pret Swain, it had a reputation of being a place to shop for exclusive, exotic, and rare-to-find items. The Emporium was managed by Doctor Uth Sulrowe, a Mon Calamari antiquities appraiser and dealer. Sulrowe appraised customers in the shop, sizing them up because of the Emporium's true purpose; as a front for weapons sales from the Caelli-Merced Syndicate. If a customer passed Sulrowe's inspection and intuition, they were invited to view the private stock by taking a turbolift to an access tunnel underground. A landspeeder ride under the eyes of Caelli-Merced security forces and the clients could peruse Caelli-Merced merchandise including weapons, landspeeders, and swoops.
